    • 字段详细资料

      • MATCH_PARENT

        public static final int MATCH_PARENT
        Special value for the height or width requested by a View. MATCH_PARENT means that the view wants to be as big as its parent, minus the parent's padding, if any. Introduced in API Level 8.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • WRAP_CONTENT

        public static final int WRAP_CONTENT
        Special value for the height or width requested by a View. WRAP_CONTENT means that the view wants to be just large enough to fit its own internal content, taking its own padding into account.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • width

        public int width
        Information about how wide the view wants to be. Can be one of the constants FILL_PARENT (replaced by MATCH_PARENT in API Level 8) or WRAP_CONTENT, or an exact size.

      • height

        public int height
        Information about how tall the view wants to be. Can be one of the constants FILL_PARENT (replaced by MATCH_PARENT in API Level 8) or WRAP_CONTENT, or an exact size.

      • leftMargin

        public int leftMargin
        The left margin in pixels of the child. Margin values should be positive. Call #setFLayoutParams(FLayoutParams) after reassigning a new value to this field.

      • topMargin

        public int topMargin
        The top margin in pixels of the child. Margin values should be positive. Call #setFLayoutParams(FLayoutParams) after reassigning a new value to this field.

      • rightMargin

        public int rightMargin
        The right margin in pixels of the child. Margin values should be positive. Call #setFLayoutParams(FLayoutParams) after reassigning a new value to this field.

      • bottomMargin

        public int bottomMargin
        The bottom margin in pixels of the child. Margin values should be positive. Call #setFLayoutParams(FLayoutParams) after reassigning a new value to this field.
